name: Escargots
description: Snails cooked in a butter and garlic sauce, often served in their shells.

name: Paté
description: A spread made from liver, typically pork or duck, often flavored with herbs and spices.

name: Rillettes
description: Shredded meat, such as pork or duck, that has been cooked in fat, then mashed and mixed with some of the fat.

name: Crostini
description: Grilled or toasted bread topped with various ingredients such as cheese, vegetables, or meat.

name: Tarte flambée
description: Thin pizza-like dough topped with crème fraîche, onions, and bacon.

name: Soufflé
description: A light and airy savory or sweet dish made from egg yolks and whites and a variety of ingredients.

name: Croquet-monsieur
description: A warm sandwich made of ham and cheese, typically Gruyere, that has been dipped in a mixture of eggs and milk, then fried.
